talent.name: Brambles
talent.rank:
Increases the chance for your Nature's Grasp to entangle an enemy by 15%.
Increases the damage caused by your Thorns and Entangling Roots spells by 10%.

Increases the chance for your Nature's Grasp to entangle an enemy by 30%.
Increases the damage caused by your Thorns and Entangling Roots spells by 20%.

Increases the chance for your Nature's Grasp to entangle an enemy by 45%.
Increases the damage caused by your Thorns and Entangling Roots spells by 30%.

Increases the chance for your Nature's Grasp to entangle an enemy by 60%.
Increases the damage caused by your Thorns and Entangling Roots spells by 40%.

talent.name: Nature's Grasp (Rank 1)
talent.rank:
While active, any time an enemy strikes the caster they have a 30% chance to become afflicted by Entangling Roots (Rank 1). 1 charge. Lasts 45 sec.
50 Mana. 1 minute cooldown.

talent.name: Improved Wrath
talent.rank: Reduces your Wrath spell's cast time by 0.1 sec and threat caused by 7%.
Reduces your Wrath spell's cast time by 0.2 sec and threat caused by 15%.
Reduces your Wrath spell's cast time by 0.3 sec and threat caused by 21%.
Reduces your Wrath spell's cast time by 0.4 sec and threat caused by 28%.
Reduces your Wrath spell's cast time by 0.5 sec and threat caused by 35%.

talent.name: Adaptability
talent.rank: Increases your Intellect by 2% of your total Agility.
Increases your Intellect by 4% of your total Agility.
Increases your Intellect by 6% of your total Agility.
Increases your Intellect by 8% of your total Agility.
Increases your Intellect by 10% of your total Agility.

talent.name: Moonglow
talent.rank:
Increases your total Intellect by 2%.
Reduces the Mana cost of all your spells by 2%.

Increases your total Intellect by 4%.
Reduces the Mana cost of all your spells by 4%.

Increases your total Intellect by 6%.
Reduces the Mana cost of all your spells by 6%.

Increases your total Intellect by 8%.
Reduces the Mana cost of all your spells by 8%.

Increases your total Intellect by 10%.
Reduces the Mana cost of all your spells by 10%.

talent.name: Dreamstate
talent.rank: Gives you an 10% chance to negate a Stun or Incapacitate effect and enter a state of sheltered hibernation for 10 seconds instead, healing you for 1% of your maximum Health every second. Damage taken may interrupt the effect.

Gives you an 20% chance to negate a Stun or Incapacitate effect and enter a state of sheltered hibernation for 10 seconds instead, healing you for 1% of your maximum Health every second. Damage taken may interrupt the effect.

talent.name: Improved Moonfire
talent.rank: Increases the damage and critical strike chance of your Moonfire spell by 3%.
Increases the damage and critical strike chance of your Moonfire spell by 6%.
Increases the damage and critical strike chance of your Moonfire spell by 10%.

talent.name: Guiding Moonlight
talent.rank:
Increases your chance to hit with spells by 1%.
Gives your Moonfire spell a 4% chance to increase the target's Arcane damage taken by 10% for 15 seconds.

Increases your chance to hit with spells by 2%.
Gives your Moonfire spell a 8% chance to increase the target's Arcane damage taken by 10% for 15 seconds.

Increases your chance to hit with spells by 3%.
Gives your Moonfire spell a 12% chance to increase the target's Arcane damage taken by 10% for 15 seconds.

Increases your chance to hit with spells by 4%.
Gives your Moonfire spell a 16% chance to increase the target's Arcane damage taken by 10% for 15 seconds.

Increases your chance to hit with spells by 5%.
Gives your Moonfire spell a 20% chance to increase the target's Arcane damage taken by 10% for 15 seconds.

talent.name: Call of Cenarius
talent.rank:
Removes all Fear, Sleep and Charm effects from you and heals you for 25% of your max Health over 21 secs. Usable in all forms but only while feared, charmed or asleep.
3 minute cooldown

talent.name: Nature's Reach
talent.rank: Increases the range of your Wrath, Entangling Roots, Faerie Fire, Moonfire, Starfire, and Hurricane spells by 10%.
Increases the range of your Wrath, Entangling Roots, Faerie Fire, Moonfire, Starfire, and Hurricane spells by 20%.

talent.name: Synergy
talent.rank:
You are granted bonuses, depending on the amount of talent points allocated in each specialization tree.
Balance - Your maximum Mana is increased by 3% of your total Strength and Spirit per allocated point.
Feral Combat - Your critical effect chance with spells is increased by 0.25% of your melee critical strike chance per allocated point.
Restoration - Your critical effect chance with Nature spells is increased by 0.05% per allocated point.

You are granted bonuses, depending on the amount of talent points allocated in each specialization tree.
Balance - Your maximum Mana is increased by 6% of your total Strength and Spirit per allocated point.
Feral Combat - Your critical effect chance with spells is increased by 0.5% of your melee critical strike chance per allocated point.
Restoration - Your critical effect chance with Nature spells is increased by 0.1% per allocated point.

talent.name: Nature's Grace
talent.rank:
All spell criticals a grace you with a blessing of nature, reducing the casting time of your next spell by 0.25 sec.
Reduces the spell casting and melee attack speed penalties of your Barkskin spell by 50%.

All spell criticals a grace you with a blessing of nature, reducing the casting time of your next spell by 0.5 sec.
Reduces the spell casting and melee attack speed penalties of your Barkskin spell by 100%.

talent.name: Celestial Impact
talent.rank: Gives your Moonfire and Starfire spells a 5% chance to stun the target for 2 sec.
Gives your Moonfire and Starfire spells a 10% chance to stun the target for 2 sec.

talent.name: Owlkin Frenzy
talent.rank: Gives you a 50% chance to gain Owlkin Frenzy for 15 secs. after being Sleeped, Silenced or interrupted while in Moonkin Form. Owlkin Frenzy prevents you from losing casting time when taking damage and reduces the global cooldown of your Balance spells by 0.5 secs.

Gives you a 100% chance to gain Owlkin Frenzy for 15 secs. after being Sleeped, Silenced or interrupted while in Moonkin Form. Owlkin Frenzy prevents you from losing casting time when taking damage and reduces the global cooldown of your Balance spells by 0.5 secs.

talent.name: Moonkin Form (Rank 1)
talent.rank:
Transforms the Druid into Moonkin Form. While in this form the armor contribution from items is increased by 200% and you regenerate 40 Mana every 5 seconds. The Moonkin can only cast Balance spells while shapeshifted.
The act of shapeshifting frees the caster of Polymorph and Movement Impairing effects.

talent.name: Improved Starfire
talent.rank: Reduces your Startfire spell's cast time by 0.25 sec. and threat caused by 10%.
Reduces your Startfire spell's cast time by 0.5 sec. and threat caused by 20%.

talent.name: Moonfury
talent.rank: Increases the spell critical strike chance of all party members within 45 yds. by 1% while in Moonkin Form.
Increases the spell critical strike chance of all party members within 45 yds. by 2% while in Moonkin Form.
Increases the spell critical strike chance of all party members within 45 yds. by 3% while in Moonkin Form.

talent.name: Vengeance
talent.rank: Increases the critical strike damage bonus of your Starfire, Moonfire, and Wrath spells by 50%.
Increases the critical strike damage bonus of your Starfire, Moonfire, and Wrath spells by 100%.

talent.name: Equilibrium (Rank 1)
talent.rank:
Based on your current Health and Mana percentages, restores 490-560 Mana plus your Mana per 5 stat if your Health level is greater, or 542-658 Health if your Mana level is greater or equal.
1.5 second cast. 280 Mana. 20 second cooldown.

talent.name: Bestial Endurance
talent.rank:
Increases your total Spirit by 5% while shapeshifted.
Allows 15% of your Health and Mana regeneration to continue at all times while shapeshifted.

Increases your total Spirit by 10% while shapeshifted.
Allows 30% of your Health and Mana regeneration to continue at all times while shapeshifted.

talent.name: Natural Shapeshifter
talent.rank: Reduces the mana cost of all shapeshifting by 10%.
Reduces the mana cost of all shapeshifting by 20%.
Reduces the mana cost of all shapeshifting by 30%.

talent.name: Feral Spirit
talent.rank: Increases your Feral Attack Power by 8% of your total Spirit.
Increases your Feral Attack Power by 16% of your total Spirit.
Increases your Feral Attack Power by 24% of your total Spirit.
Increases your Feral Attack Power by 32% of your total Spirit.
Increases your Feral Attack Power by 40% of your total Spirit.

talent.name: Brutal Impact
talent.rank:
Increases the stun duration of your Bash ability by 0.5 sec.
Increases the damage done by your Ravage ability by 5%.

Increases the stun duration of your Bash ability by 1 sec.
Increases the damage done by your Ravage ability by 10%.

talent.name: Astral Claws
talent.rank:
Increases your melee critical strike chance while in Bear, Dire Bear, Cat or Moonkin Form by 2%.
Increases the spell penetration of your Arcane spells and effects by 5 while in Moonkin Form.

Increases your melee critical strike chance while in Bear, Dire Bear, Cat or Moonkin Form by 4%.
Increases the spell penetration of your Arcane spells and effects by 10 while in Moonkin Form.

Increases your melee critical strike chance while in Bear, Dire Bear, Cat or Moonkin Form by 6%.
Increases the spell penetration of your Arcane spells and effects by 15 while in Moonkin Form.

talent.name: Thick Hide
talent.rank:
Grants the armor bonus of your Bear, Dire Bear or Moonkin Form for 0.5 sec after shifting out of it.
Increases your Armor contribution from items by 2%.

Grants the armor bonus of your Bear, Dire Bear or Moonkin Form for 1 sec after shifting out of it.
Increases your Armor contribution from items by 4%.

Grants the armor bonus of your Bear, Dire Bear or Moonkin Form for 1.5 sec after shifting out of it.
Increases your Armor contribution from items by 6%.

Grants the armor bonus of your Bear, Dire Bear or Moonkin Form for 2 sec after shifting out of it.
Increases your Armor contribution from items by 8%.

Grants the armor bonus of your Bear, Dire Bear or Moonkin Form for 2.5 sec after shifting out of it.
Increases your Armor contribution from items by 10%.

talent.name: Predatory Strikes
talent.rank: Your critical strikes from Cat Form abilities that add combo points have a 50% chance to add an additional combo point.
Your critical strikes from Cat Form abilities that add combo points have a 100% chance to add an additional combo point.

talent.name: Feline Swiftness
talent.rank:
Increases your movement speed by 5% while in Cat Form.
Reduces the cooldown of Dash by 40 seconds.

Increases your movement speed by 10% while in Cat Form.
Reduces the cooldown of Dash by 80 seconds.

Increases your movement speed by 15% while in Cat Form.
Reduces the cooldown of Dash by 120 seconds.

talent.name: Feral Charge
talent.rank:
Causes you to charge an enemy, immobilizing and interrupting any spell being cast for 4 sec.
5 Rage. 20 second cooldown.

talent.name: Ursine Fury
talent.rank: Gives you a 50% chance to gain an additional 5 Rage anytime you get a critical strike while in Bear and Dire Bear Form.
Gives you a 100% chance to gain an additional 5 Rage anytime you get a critical strike while in Bear and Dire Bear Form.

talent.name: Improved Tiger's Fury
talent.rank: Reduces the Energy cost of your Tiger's Fury by 5.
Reduces the Energy cost of your Tiger's Fury by 10.

talent.name: Heightened Reflexes
talent.rank: While in Cat Form, Bear Form or Dire Bear form your chance to dodge is increased by 2% and chance to be hit by area of effect attacks is reduced by 5%.
While in Cat Form, Bear Form or Dire Bear form your chance to dodge is increased by 4% and chance to be hit by area of effect attacks is reduced by 10%.
While in Cat Form, Bear Form or Dire Bear form your chance to dodge is increased by 6% and chance to be hit by area of effect attacks is reduced by 15%.

talent.name: Feral Instinct
talent.rank:
Reduces the cost of your Maul and Swipe abilities by 1 Rage.
Reduces the chance enemies have to detect you while Prowling.

Reduces the cost of your Maul and Swipe abilities by 2 Rage.

Reduces the cost of your Maul and Swipe abilities by 3 Rage.

Reduces the cost of your Maul and Swipe abilities by 5 Rage.

talent.name: Survival Instinct
talent.rank:
While in Bear or Dire Bear Form your Defense skill is increased by 15% of your level.

While in Bear or Dire Bear Form your Defense skill is increased by 30% of your level.

While in Bear or Dire Bear Form your Defense skill is increased by 50% of your level.

talent.name: Blood Frenzy
talent.rank:
While active, increases your attack speed by 20% and restores 2 Energy when you hit a bleeding target. Lasts 30 seconds.
40 Energy. 2 minute cooldown.

talent.name: Packhunter
talent.rank:
While in Cat Form your Attack Power is increased by 10% of your level for every party member within 45 yards.
Increases your Feral Combat skill by 2.

While in Cat Form your Attack Power is increased by 20% of your level for every party member within 45 yards.
Increases your Feral Combat skill by 4

While in Cat Form your Attack Power is increased by 30% of your level for every party member within 45 yards.
Increases your Feral Combat skill by 6.

While in Cat Form your Attack Power is increased by 40% of your level for every party member within 45 yards.
Increases your Feral Combat skill by 8.

While in Cat Form your Attack Power is increased by 50% of your level for every party member within 45 yards.
Increases your Feral Combat skill by 10.

talent.name: Heart of the Wild
talent.rank:
While in Bear or Dire Bear Form your Stamina is increased by 2% and an additional 2% of your total Spirit.
Increases your Strength by 2%.

While in Bear or Dire Bear Form your Stamina is increased by 4% and an additional 4% of your total Spirit.
Increases your Strength by 4%.

While in Bear or Dire Bear Form your Stamina is increased by 6% and an additional 6% of your total Spirit.
Increases your Strength by 6%.

While in Bear or Dire Bear Form your Stamina is increased by 8% and an additional 8% of your total Spirit.
Increases your Strength by 8%.

While in Bear or Dire Bear Form your Stamina is increased by 10% and an additional 10% of your total Spirit.
Increases your Strength by 10%.

talent.name: Lacerate (Rank 1)
talent.rank:
Lacerates the enemy target, dealing 36 damage and making them bleed for 30 damage over 15 secs. Causes a high amount of threat. This effect stacks up to 5 times.
10 Rage.

talent.name: Ferocity
talent.rank:
Increases the damage caused by your Ferocious Bite and Rip abilities by 5%.
Reduces the Energy cost of your Shred ability by 4.

talent.rank: Reduces the cooldown of your Enrage ability by 10 seconds.
Reduces the cooldown of your Enrage ability by 20 seconds.
Reduces the cooldown of your Enrage ability by 30 seconds.

talent.name: Leader of the Pack
talent.rank: While in Cat Form, all your party members within 45 yards have their melee and ranged critical strike chance increased by 3%, and all their cooldowns reduced by 1 second when you deal a critical strike.

talent.name: Guardian of the Wild
talent.rank:
Your Growl, Challenging Roar, Feral Charge and Frenzied Regeneration abilities reduce all damage taken by 20% for 3 seconds.
Your Enrage ability makes you immune to Fear, Sleep and Incapacitating effects for the duration.
Your Bash ability interrupts spellcasting and prevents any spell in that school from being cast for 4 seconds.

talent.name: Improved Mark of the Wild
talent.rank: Increases the effects of your Mark of the Wild and Gift of the Wild spells by 8%.
Increases the effects of your Mark of the Wild and Gift of the Wild spells by 16%.
Increases the effects of your Mark of the Wild and Gift of the Wild spells by 24%.
Increases the effects of your Mark of the Wild and Gift of the Wild spells by 32%.
Increases the effects of your Mark of the Wild and Gift of the Wild spells by 40%.

talent.name: Furor
talent.rank: Gives you 20% chance to gain 10 Rage when you shapeshift into Bear and Dire Bear Form or 40 Energy when you shapeshift into Cat Form.
Gives you 40% chance to gain 10 Rage when you shapeshift into Bear and Dire Bear Form or 40 Energy when you shapeshift into Cat Form.
Gives you 60% chance to gain 10 Rage when you shapeshift into Bear and Dire Bear Form or 40 Energy when you shapeshift into Cat Form.

Gives you 100% chance to gain 10 Rage when you shapeshift into Bear and Dire Bear Form or 40 Energy when you shapeshift into Cat Form.

talent.name: Reflection
talent.rank: Allows 15% of your Mana regeneration to continue while casting.
Allows 30% of your Mana regeneration to continue while casting.
Allows 45% of your Mana regeneration to continue while casting.

talent.name: Reconstitution
talent.rank:
Increases the Health and Mana restored by your Rebirth spell by 15%.
Restores 5% of your base Health when you shapeshift.

Increases the Health and Mana restored by your Rebirth spell by 30%.
Restores 10% of your base Health when you shapeshift.

Increases the Health and Mana restored by your Rebirth spell by 45%.
Restores 15% of your base Health when you shapeshift.

talent.name: Forest Sentinel
talent.rank: Increases your healing power by 5% of your total Strength and Agility.
Increases your healing power by 10% of your total Strength and Agility.
Increases your healing power by 15% of your total Strength and Agility.
Increases your healing power by 20% of your total Strength and Agility.
Increases your healing power by 25% of your total Strength and Agility.

talent.name: Improved Rejuvenation
talent.rank:
Reduces the Mana cost of your Rejuvenation spell by 5%.
Your Rejuvenation increases the effect of Healing Touch on the target by 1% per stack.

Reduces the Mana cost of your Rejuvenation spell by 10%.
Your Rejuvenation increases the effect of Healing Touch on the target by 2% per stack.

Reduces the Mana cost of your Rejuvenation spell by 15%.
Your Rejuvenation increases the effect of Healing Touch on the target by 3% per stack.

talent.name: Swiftmend
talent.rank:
Consumes all Rejuvenation stacks or a Regrowth effect on a friendly target to instantly heal them an amount equal to 12 sec. of Rejuvenation for each stack or 18 sec. of Regrowth.
This spell has a 25% increased critical effect chance.
20% base Mana. 15 second cooldown.

talent.name: Improved Regrowth
talent.rank:
Increases the critical effect chance of your Regrowth spell by 10% and its dispel resistance by 6%.
Your Regrowth increases the critical effect chance of Healing Touch on the target by 2%.

Increases the critical effect chance of your Regrowth spell by 20% and its dispel resistance by 12%.
Your Regrowth increases the critical effect chance of Healing Touch on the target by 4%.

Increases the critical effect chance of your Regrowth spell by 30% and its dispel resistance by 18%.
Your Regrowth increases the critical effect chance of Healing Touch on the target by 6%.

Increases the critical effect chance of your Regrowth spell by 40% and its dispel resistance by 24%.
Your Regrowth increases the critical effect chance of Healing Touch on the target by 8%.

Increases the critical effect chance of your Regrowth spell by 50% and its dispel resistance by 30%.
Your Regrowth increases the critical effect chance of Healing Touch on the target by 10%.

talent.name: Gift of Nature
talent.rank:
Increases your base stats by 2%.
Increases the damage and healing done by your Nature spells by 1%.

Increases your base stats by 4%.
Increases the damage and healing done by your Nature spells by 2%.

Increases your base stats by 6%.
Increases the damage and healing done by your Nature spells by 3%.

Increases your base stats by 8%.
Increases the damage and healing done by your Nature spells by 4%.

Increases your base stats by 10%.
Increases the damage and healing done by your Nature spells by 5%.

talent.name: Tranquil Air
talent.rank:
Reduces your Tranquility and Hurricane spells' mana cost and threat caused by 30%.
Reduces the threat caused by your healing spells by 10%.

Reduces your Tranquility and Hurricane spells' mana cost and threat caused by 60%.
Reduces the threat caused by your healing spells by 20%.

talent.name: Nature's Renewal
talent.rank: Reduces the cooldown of Nature's Swiftness, Tranquility, Innervate, Rebirth, Frenzied Regeneration, Barkskin and Nature's Grasp spells by 10%.
Reduces the cooldown of Nature's Swiftness, Tranquility, Innervate, Rebirth, Frenzied Regeneration, Barkskin and Nature's Grasp spells by 20%.

talent.name: Celerity
talent.rank: Reduces the cast time of your Healing Touch, Wrath and Innervate spells by 0.25 secs.
Reduces the cast time of your Healing Touch, Wrath and Innervate spells by 0.5 secs.

talent.name: Nature's Swiftness
talent.rank:
When activated, your next Nature spell becomes an instant cast spell.
3 minute cooldown.

talent.name: Invigoration
talent.rank: Gives your periodic healing effects a 5% chance to restore 10 Rage, 20 Energy or 6% base Mana to their targets. Only works if the target is in combat.
Gives your periodic healing effects a 10% chance to restore 10 Rage, 20 Energy or 6% base Mana to their targets. Only works if the target is in combat.

talent.name: Tranquil Spirit
talent.rank:
Increases your total Spirit by 5%.
Increases the dispel resistance of your Restoration spells and effects by 15%.

Increases your total Spirit by 10%.
Increases the dispel resistance of your Restoration spells and effects by 30%.

talent.name: Spirit of the Grove
talent.rank: Increases your healing power and Nature spell power by 15% of your total Spirit.
Increases your healing power and Nature spell power by 25% of your total Spirit.
Increases your healing power and Nature spell power by 33% of your total Spirit.

talent.name: Emerald Touch
talent.rank:
Slows the enemy target by 10% for 10 seconds.
Causes Humanoids, Giants and Dragonkin to fall asleep for 20 seconds if already affected by an Emerald Touch effect. Heals the target for 5% of their maximum Health every 2 secs. while asleep. Any damage will awaken the target. Only one target at a time can be put to sleep with this effect.
2 second cast. 125 Mana.

notes.note:
Insect Swarm - REMOVED
Entangling Roots - Outdoor restriction removed.
Rejuvenation - Now stacks up to 3 times. Mana cost and healing reduced.
Innervate - Now has a 3 second cast time. Cooldown lowered to 5 minutes.

Druid base stats at level 60:
Health 1483 Mana 1244
STR 66 AGI 60 STAM 71 INT 97 SPI 111

Ravage the target, causing 400% damage instantly and 270 damage over 12 seconds. Must be prowling and behind the target. Awards 1 combo point.
60 Energy

Stun the target for 2 sec and slow their movement speed by 40% for 8 sec. Must be prowling and behind the target. Awards 1 combo point.
50 Energy.

Regenerates 300 Health over 12 seconds.
40 Rage. 30 second cooldown.

Returns the spirit to the body, restoring a dead target to life with 600 Health and 800 Mana. Cannot be cast when in combat.
10 second cast. 80% base Mana.

Decrease the armor of the target by 505 and increase periodic magical damage taken by up to 45 for 40 sec. While affected, the target cannot stealth or turn invisible.
115 Mana.
